entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm.
